meanings: Noun 애, 문제, 곤란, 골칫거리 (→teething troubles)

vlive.korean: 조금 트러블이 났죠? I have some blemishes. 듣기 View video HANABONO : 지성피부 하나보노의 가을, 겨울 백화점 파운데이션 추천 HIGH-END FOUNDATIONS REVIEW
[트러블 잡는 마법의 분홍가루?] [A magic pink powder that gets rid of skin trouble?] View video HANABONO : 드디어 한국에 세포라 오픈! 세포라에서 사온 모공줄이는화장품추천 총 14만원어치입니다
vlive.english: [A magic pink powder that gets rid of skin trouble?]

vlive.korean: 승윤 씨 얼굴에 최근에 트러블 올라온 건 어떻게 됐어요? What happened to the blemishes on your face? 듣기 View video WINNER : 강승윤 생일 브이라이브 🎉YOONSBIRTHDAY🙏🏼❤️
vlive.english: What happened to the blemishes on your face?

vlive.korean: 트러블이 많이 나면 여러분들이 제일 먼저 병원에서... When you have acne, you will visit the hospital... 듣기 View video 카모마일T (Chamomile_T) : 3주만에 여드름 없애는 꿀팁 & 추천하는 제품
vlive.english: When you have acne, you will visit the hospital...

vlive.korean: 특히 트러블이 나거나 트러블을 짜고 난 다음... Especially when you use it as soon as you get acne or after you squeeze your acne... 듣기 View video 카모마일T (Chamomile_T) : 3주만에 여드름 없애는 꿀팁 & 추천하는 제품
vlive.english: Especially when you use it as soon as you get acne or after you squeeze your acne...

examples.korean: Other ways to treat skin problems are chemical peels and light therapies. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 피부 트러블을 치료할 다른 방법으로는 화학박피와 자외선 요법이 있다. Neungyule
examples.english: Other ways to treat skin problems are chemical peels and light therapies. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Remove your make-up before your workout to prevent blemish. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 피부 트러블을 방지하기 위해 운동전에는 화장을 지워주세요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Remove your make-up before your workout to prevent blemish. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I worry a lot about my skin problems[condition]. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 피부 트러블 때문에 고민이 많다 Neungyule
examples.english: I worry a lot about my skin problems[condition]. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Our cleaning products are just as effective but they’re dye-free and made from all natural ingredients so they are non-toxic and don’t irritate skin. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 저희 청소용품은 효과도 뒤떨어지지 않지만 염료가 들어 있지 않고 천연 소재로 만들었기 때문에 독성이 없고 피부 트러블도 일으키지 않습니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Our cleaning products are just as effective but they’re dye-free and made from all natural ingredients so they are non-toxic and don’t irritate skin. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: All calls will be monitored so you'll have no trouble with customers. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 모든 통화가 모니터되기 때문에 고객들과의 트러블은 없을 것입니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: All calls will be monitored so you'll have no trouble with customers. Add to Wordbook
